phase.text: Oh! Oh! Thank goodness, help is here! Please, hurry and HELP ME!!

userResponse.option: Don’t worry, Lab. I’ll have you out in a jiffy!

phase.text: Oh, woe! It was Lia! Lia betrayed me! She's EVIL! I was working on an upgrade to the Bin Weevil Changer, and I showed her everything...

userResponse.option: I know about Lia, she tricked me too. Don't panic, I'll find a way to stop her!

phase.text: You don't understand...with a few tweaks to my invention, she could transform every single Bin Weevil into a nasty Thugg IN ONE GO!
I can't believe I trusted her! Aaah, my precious inventions, my potions, my robots! We're running out of time, cut me free! I have an idea!
phase.textOnReturn: Please, hurry and cut me free. Use your gun!
